CustomField.description: Critical data point for financial services reporting
CustomField.formula: Net_Tuition__c - Amount_Paid__c - Pell_Grant_Amount_Paid__c - Student_Loan_Amount_Paid__c - Parent_Loan_Amount_Paid__c - Private_Loan_Amount_Paid__c - Deposit_Amount__c - Verto_Fund_Amount__c + Refunded_Amount__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Net Tuition minus Amount Paid, Pell Grant Amount Paid, loan amounts paid, Verto Fund Amount and Deposit Amount. Takes into consideration any refunded amount.
CustomField.label: Actual Amount Due
